overview:
Yukari is a tech writer based in Tokyo. She has worked for a few startups in Tokyo, and became a freelance writer in 2009.

Her writings can be found on tech glocal media “TechWave”, and professional magazine “nikkei digital marketing” and others. She introduces Japanese startups at Singapore based startup “Penn-Olson”, here is a list of her articles.

http://www.penn-olson.com/author/yukari/

She has strong network in the Japanese startup industry. She wants to support them by what she does best, writing.
